title: Undefined reference to 'scotchyylex' during installation of scotch
body:
I am currently trying to install qr_mumps with spack fork fpruvost on a cluster under CentOS release 6.6. 
One of the required dependencies is scotch@6.0.4%gcc@5.4.0~compression+esmumps~grf~idx64~mpi+pthread+shared arch=linux-x86_64. Sadly, upon installation, an error is returned:
